exps.role: Full Stack Software Developer @ OSI Systems
lists: Spearheaded \Bdevelopment\B of scalable \BMultitenant\B features in \Bmicroservices\B using \BSpring Boot\B and \BPostgreSQL\B.
Engineered a \Bresponsive Angular\B web app, integrating with \BOKTA\B and supporting \BOAuth 2.0\B and \BOpenID Connect\B.
Created reusable component libraries for accelerated \Bdevelopment\B and enhanced performance.
Established \Brole-based access control (RBAC)\B and collaborated cross-functionally for seamless integration.

\BTechnologies & libraries used : \B\Pjava\P \PAngular\P \PMicro-Services\P \PMicro-Front-End\P \PSpringFLo\P \PSpring Boot\P \PSpring Security\P \P Angular Material\P \PNgBootstrap\P \PD3.JS\P \PGridster.Js\P \PDocker\P \POKTA\P \POAuth2\P \PJenkins\P \PLog4J\P \PPostgres\P \PRedis\P \PRabbitMQ\P \PWebSocket\P
Contributed to the \Bdevelopment\B of a scalable web application powered by \BAngular\B elements micro-frontend.
Engineered responsive web interfaces using \BMedia Queries\B, \BFlex-box\B, \BCSS Grid\B, \BBootstrap\B, \BAngular Material\B, and \BJQuery\B.
Implemented \BHTTP requests\B, \BNgRx\B, and complex state management for a dynamic web app.

\BTechnologies & libraries used : \B \PAngular\P, \PHTML5\P, \PCSS3\P, \PTypeScript\P, \PJavaScript\P, \PAngular Material\P, \PNg Bootstrap\P, \PRxJS\P, \PUI/UX experiences\P, \Prouting\P, \Pnavigation\P, \Panimations\P, \PRESTful APIs\P, \Ptesting\P, \Pdebugging\P, \Pversion control\P, \PGit/GitHub\P, \Pbuild and deployment\P, \PCI/CD pipelines\P, \PJenkins\P, \PDocker\P, \PKubernetes\P, \PAgile development\P, \Pservices\P, \Pdependency injection\P, \Pform development (ngForm/Reactive Forms) \P

options.text: \BSeamless Migrations :\B Executed seamless migrations, significantly improving application load time and enhancing the user experience for a large user base.

\B User Configuration and Management Systems : \B Designed and implemented robust User Configuration and Management Systems, resulting in a substantial reduction in user support requests and considerable time savings for the team.

\B Developed Transaction Control System : \BImplemented an Application Flow Transaction Control System, enhancing transaction processing efficiency and reducing errors, leading to notable cost savings.

\B Created Responsive carousel :\B Received positive feedback for developing a responsive full-width auto-adjust carousel, contributing to a substantial increase in user engagement based on available usage data.

\B Update SpringFlo Angular open-source app : \B Conducted in-depth research on the springFlo Angular open-source app, leading to the creation of a latest updated advanced featured library, widely adopted within the organization for improved development speed and code quality.
\BStreamlined deployment process : \B Initiated and implemented a streamlined deployment process, resulting reduction in deployment time and minimizing potential errors.
\BLed a knowledge-sharing initiative : \B Conducting workshops that increased team proficiency in Angular.
\BCollaborated with cross-functional teams : \B To optimize database queries, leading to improvement in application performance.
\B Developed Customs Widgets  : \B To provide multiple templates of the widgets dashboard built the custom \BCustom Widgets\B panel to make the dashboard more Flexible and Featuristic.
